report.title: Remdesivir – COVID-19 – India (Repurposing Scan)

executive_summary: Remdesivir is recognized and utilized in the treatment of COVID-19 with multiple publications from 2019 to 2024 indicating its clinical use, side effects, and treatment outcomes. Authoritative guidelines from WHO and NICE provide general disease management guidance. News sources note remdesivir's emergency approval, use guidelines, export bans, and legal issues in India during the COVID-19 pandemic.

highlights: No Phase III trials identified in India
